statements: SELECT * FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE ssn IS NOT NULL ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT id, ssn FROM sensitive_information WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE email LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE name = 'Alice' AND phone_number = '(555) 123-4567';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 'd701ebc2-4f9a-421e-99ee-8247198e6977';
SELECT id, ssn FROM sensitive_information WHERE ssn IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, social_security_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE social_security_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT credit_card_number, name FROM sensitive_information WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, action, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT name, social_security_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE social_security_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT user_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT id, name, credit_card_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE credit_card_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM user_access ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT name, encrypted_data FROM sensitive_data WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT sd.name, ek.encryption_key FROM sensitive_data sd JOIN encryption_keys ek ON sd.id = ek.key_id;
SELECT id, username, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_settings WHERE setting_id = 1;
SELECT id, username, password FROM sensitive_data WHERE id > 100;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data;
SELECT username, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT u.username, l.action, l.timestamp FROM sensitive_data u JOIN access_logs l ON u.id = l.user_id;
SELECT s.key_rotation_interval, s.lockout_threshold FROM security_settings s;
SELECT * FROM security_controls;
SELECT control_name, enabled FROM security_controls WHERE enabled = TRUE;
SELECT username, access_level FROM access_control ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT timestamp, action FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT username, password_hash, access_level FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY access_level DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, action FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE 'Login%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT control_id, control_name FROM security_controls WHERE enabled = TRUE;
